page.title: 01GAZETTEER OF NEWTON ABBOT
page.content: The information provided will give an overall impression of life in Newton Abbot.It is a rural market town set in the heart of{Devon.}The area around is mainly{farmland}so the town centres around the market.The schools covering the area of Newton Abbot were{Milber, {Decoy, Wolborough Hill, St.Josephs}and {Coombeshead.}We have{general inform- {ation}on Transport,Farming and employ- ment in the area.We also have{specific {information}on items such as the Mormon Church and Buckland.Town problems and worries include{planning, {traffic,}and{unemployment.}The pages we have written about are: Town planning;Employment;Recreation;Transpo rt;Mormon church;Buckland Community Centre;Local history;Farming;Popula- tion;My house;W0lborough & Abbotskers- well,Local amenities and concerns; Station area;Shopping;landscape.
